mapper.sql: line_id, header_id, is_ship, weight, specific_id, piece_num, Unit_Price, remarks, created_by, created_date, last_updated_by, last_updated_date, organization_id
mapper.select: select , (select ph.item from po_header ph where ph.header_id = p.header_id and ph.organization_id = p.organization_id) as item, (select ph.item_id from po_header ph where ph.header_id = p.header_id and ph.organization_id = p.organization_id) as item_id, (select ds.dict_data_name from sys_dict_datas ds where ds.id = p.specific_id and ds.organization_id = p.organization_id and ds.dict_id = 3) as specificName from po_line p where header_id = #{poHeaderId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and organization_id = #{organizationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into po_line
line_id,
header_id,
is_ship,
weight,
specific_id,
piece_num,
Unit_Price,
remarks,
created_by,
created_date,
last_updated_by,
last_updated_date,
organization_id,

mapper.update:
update po_line
header_id = #{headerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_ship = #{isShip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
specific_id = #{specificId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
piece_num = #{pieceNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Unit_Price = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_updated_by = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_updated_date = #{lastUpdatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
organization_id = #{organizationId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where line_id = #{lineId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update po_line set header_id = #{headerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, is_ship = #{isShip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, specific_id = #{specificId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, piece_num = #{pieceNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Unit_Price = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_updated_by = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_updated_date = #{lastUpdatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, organization_id = #{organizationId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where line_id = #{lineId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
